title: They Finally Won
description:
On The Gist, learn why WNYC’s Ilya Marritz decided to profile the Columbia University Lions for a new show called The Season. Plus, we’ll hear from the team’s co-captain and star running back Cameron Molina about how a new coach is helping him and his teammates rediscover a love of the game. For The Spiel, tomorrow’s the day Marty McFly travels to in Back to the Future Part II and still no hoverboards.
Today’s sponsor:
The Message, a new podcast series from GE Podcast Theater
